text:
@realDonaldTrump I thought U already did (according to U)...
Wall U promised isn't done
Turmoil in our country escalated
COVID-19 came & killed so many before U even accepted it as an issue
Ur taxes are still blowing in the wind
U've changed support people more often than mom's change diapers
